Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, we're here!
Welcome to the Animal Sanctuary!
<PAGE>
Here your animals can graze and eat to
their heart's content, lowering their
stress. The longer they stay the better.
<PAGE>
Well, I'm just killing time here.
Spend some time with your animals.
The return trip is at <BLUE>9 PM</BLUE>.
